```{r Libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(here); library(tidyverse)
```
```{r Data, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
cmp<-read_csv(here("CMP.zip"))
```
```{r Cleaning}
#per109:internationalism_negative, per406:protectionism_positive,per608:multiculturalism_negative,per601:national_...
cmp2 <- cmp %>%
  filter(date>"197912" & date<"202101") %>%
  group_by(countryname,date) %>%
  summarise(nat_sum=sum(per109+per406+per608+per601)) #the sum of "nationalist" platforms in a country-election, some measure of incumbent response
cmp3<- cmp2 %>%
  group_by(countryname) %>%
  mutate(earliest_date=198001) %>%
  select(countryname,earliest_date) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  expand(date=earliest_date:202012,earliest_date) %>%
  select(-earliest_date)
cmp_fin<- cmp3 %>%
  left_join(cmp2,by=c("countryname","date"))
```
